title: American Horror Story Weekly Wednesday Live Stream
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I hope Apocalypse explores the darker aspects of magic that was never fully explored in Coven.

I think the first 5 episodes will be the Apocalypse with Micheal appearing to win during episode 5, however i think the coven will then travel back in time. That’s what I think triggers Madison to go to the murder house before the world ends. So I think the rest of the season would be the coven fighting to save the world. This would also explain the hourglass in the promos.
SO PSYCHED ABOUT THIS EVENING, I COULD CRACK IN HALF!!!
one of my theories  is that a lottery is held to pick winners to visit/stay at Outpost 3 knowing that an Apocalypse is going to happen
They really should ask you to cameo in  AHS, you'd be an AMAZING  addition to the coven ;) xxx
